rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, if a non-Treasure permanent you control left the battlefield this turn, create a Treasure token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Goblin Sous Chef

Sous chef is cute, but I feel like it’s a little slow and narrow to want to be one of our creatures slots, especially when there’s artifact destruction in the noncreature slots.
